title: Daily Dungeon Mission Not Resetting
body: Hey, I did the daily dungeon mission yesterday after buying the dungeon pass and it's over 4 hours past 11 am PT and it still hasn't reset. Did I get something wrong? I dug around the site and nothing seems to explain this issue for me. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: I bought the dungeon pass and my daily missions aren't resetting

Those daily missions should be resetting by 11am LOCAL time, but if you still aren't seeing that Daily Mission go ahead and shoot our game team a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They should be able to figure out what's going on and get that mission going for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0baUMVyL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-11T22:50:49.994+0000)
>
> Those daily missions should be resetting by 11am LOCAL time, but if you still aren't seeing that Daily Mission go ahead and shoot our game team a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They should be able to figure out what's going on and get that mission going for you.

I've already sent a ticket about having the same problem. My Daily Mission hasn't reset yet. But I'm worried that they won't respond to my ticket in time and I will lose out on 1 mission.

Multiple times in the past it has taken the support team well over a day to respond.
I also submitted a ticket and share Ctrl Alt Delete's concern, usually a ticket takes a day or three to respond.

Oh so that means I had 39 hours to do the first daily mission ? I got it at 8pm local on the 10th.

Edit : Oh well, guess I just had to write about it on the boards for it to appear. Got it at around 1am local.
Same here, did my mission yesterday but didn't have a new one today. I feel kinda scammed :/
